author: LegoFrancis
title: 2 cars and bridge, nothing more
review:
Title says it all..

A set with two "half" minifigs, a car with type 2 pull-back motor(common)and a car with type 3 pull-back motor(very rare).

The bridge has got a group of brown pieces and flora that can be put into any Lego City...

Pros

-Pull-Back Motor type 3
-2001 football sets minifig head
-bridge that can be on any Lego City

Cons

-You can't compete with this cars against the others like hot scortcher, nitro pulverizer...

Try to get this set at bricklink, you won't regret it...
